Zero remains silent for the most part during the discussion between 
the Chivtrons. HE stands silently and looks outside a nearby window 
and sighs thinking of Cybertron and what was happening on the planet. 
He goes into a daze as he remembers the events that transpired a 
short time before his arrival... He was running... running from a 
menace unlike anything the cybertronians had faced, they were small 
robotic arachnids that were given the name replicators by their 
original creators who the Infecticons had destroyed. They transported 
the things to Cybertron during a great battle between the Maximal and 
Predacon fleets. There they used the very metal the planet was made 
of to Replicate. Before anyone could notice there was over a billion 
lurking in the depths of Cybertron. Zero recalls the sky of cybertron 
when the Infecticons broke through the combined Maximal and Predacon 
fleet... they were red with fire, all over ships of energy and metal 
we slamming into buildings, and if that wasnt enough the Replicators 
made their presence known on the southern half of the planet and 
quickly overtook it. Zero himself was on the planets equator. Above 
him an Infecticon Marauder with several Deathgliders and Abyss' were 
chasing down a squadron of Maximal Blurr fighters. Before he knew it 
he was surrounded by Infecticon Infantry each firing plasma blasts at 
him and his Partner. Both bots began a mad dash for a bunker that had 
been established in the city as a last defense against the 
replicators and ground troops. However before they could get there 
they were blocked off by Replicators. They both ducked into another 
alley but were faced with dead end. Zero watched helpessly as his 
friend panicked beside him and ran out of the alley only to be cut 
down by an uncountable number of blasts, the only part of him left 
was a hand. Zero Turned and activated his boosters which were blasted 
a sometime before hand and were severely damaged. He slowly rose into 
the air when a bright flash erupted from beneath him. A portal. 
Before he knew what was happenening he was blasted from behind and 
sent barreling down into the portal. That was where his day dream 
ended.. and upon its conclusion Zero fell to his knees and clnched 
his fists in anger as he placed his ehad against the wall trying to 
supress the memory...
